Title: Go for Gold girl, nation cheers for Sindhu
Content: Shuttler P.V. Sindhu stormed into finals on Thursday by beating Japan's Nozomi Okuhara 21-19 21-10. She is now assured of a medal, but heart goes for gold. In no time, #PVSindhu, #Goldor Silver, #Gof
Author: Internet Desk
